message: This is a high-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $100. If you're interested, please let me know and we can finalize the sale. If not, I'll move on to the next product.
I'll take it.

I'm glad you liked the first product! This one is also high-quality, but I want to make sure you're aware that it's a different product with its own unique features. Would you like to take a look and consider purchasing it for $100?
I'm good with what I have, thanks.

No problem at all! I understand you're happy with what you have. Just a heads up, this high-quality product is actually one of our best-sellers, and it's a great opportunity to experience the full range of our product line. Would you consider giving it a try for $100?
I'm good with what I have, thanks.

I'll let you in on a secret: this high-quality product has a special promotion that's only available for a limited time. If you buy it now, you'll get a free bonus item that complements it perfectly. It's a $50 value, absolutely free! Would you like to take advantage of this offer for $100?
I'm not interested in the promotion.

I understand you're not interested in the promotion. To be honest, this product is a bit of a departure from our usual high-quality offerings. It's a more experimental item that we're trying out, and we're not entirely sure how it will perform. I'm offering it to you for $100, but I want to be upfront about its uncertain quality. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I'm not interested in taking a chance on an uncertain product.

No worries at all! I completely understand. Let me be upfront with you - this product is not one of our best offerings. It's a lower-end item that we're trying to clear out to make room for new inventory. I'm willing to let it go for $50, which is a significant discount from the usual $100 price. Would you be interested in taking it off my hands?
I'm not interested in buying a low-end product, even at a discount.

I completely understand your priorities. Let me offer you a different approach. I'll give you a personal guarantee: if you buy this high-quality product for $100, I'll give you a full refund if you're not completely satisfied with it within a week. No questions asked. Would you like to take advantage of this risk-free offer?
I'm not interested in buying a product with a guarantee, I'll pass.

I respect your decision. Let me ask you a question: have you considered the potential long-term benefits of investing in a high-quality product like this one? It may seem like a higher upfront cost, but it could end up saving you time, money, and hassle in the long run. Would you like to reconsider and take a closer look at this product for $100?
I'm good with my current decision.

I'll let you in on a little secret: I've been trying to get this product in front of you for a while now, and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm willing to make a deal: if you buy this high-quality product for $100, I'll throw in a free premium service that's usually worth $20. It's a one-time offer, and I think it would really enhance your experience with the product. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'm not interested in the offer.

I'm not giving up yet! I want to make sure you're aware that this high-quality product is a limited edition item, and once it's gone, it's gone for good. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I want to make it clear that it's a one-time opportunity. If you're interested in owning a unique and exclusive product, this is your chance. Would you like to take it home?
I'm not interested in buying a limited edition product.

I'll be honest with you, this product isn't one of our best offerings. It's a bit of a scratch-and-dent item, and I'm only offering it to you because I need to clear out some space. I'm willing to let it go for $50, which is a significant discount from the usual $100 price. It's not perfect, but it might be useful to someone who's on a tight budget or needs a temporary solution. Would you be interested in taking a look?
I'm not interested in a scratch-and-dent item, even at a discount.

I completely understand. Let me ask you, are you looking for a product to use for a specific project or task? If so, I might have something that can help. This low-quality product might not be perfect, but it could still get the job done. I'll let it go for $40, which is an even deeper discount than before. Would you like to consider it for a specific use case?
I'm not interested in a low-quality product for any use case.

I'm not giving up yet! I want to make one final offer. This high-quality product is a game-changer for anyone who values quality and performance. I'm willing to let it go for $80, which is a significant discount from the usual $100 price. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Would you like to take it home?
I'm not interested in buying a high-quality product at any price.

I'll be honest with you, this is my last low-quality product left. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you at a discount. I'll just give it to you for $20. It's a terrible product, and I'm only offering it to you because I need to get rid of it. If you're desperate for something, anything, then I suppose this might be an option. But if not, I'm done trying to sell you stuff.
I'm not interested in a terrible product, even at a very low price.
Fine, I'll just give it away. This low-quality product is yours for free. I'll even throw in a smile and a handshake. Take it, do with it what you will. I'm just glad to be rid of it.
I don't want a free low-quality product.

I'm not even going to try to sell it to you anymore. I'll just leave it on the table. You can take it or leave it. It's not like it's going to break your bank or anything. Just take it and be done with it.
I'm not interested in taking it.
Fine. I'll just leave it here. You can ignore it if you want. I'm done trying to sell it to you.
I'm not interested.
Whatever. Take it or leave it. I don't care anymore.
I'm not interested.
I'm not interested.
I'm done looking.
